flawed_nl_solution:
In total Liam has saved ($500/month * 12 months/year) * 2 years = $120000
When Liam pays his bills, he will have $120000 - $3500 = $<<120000-3500=116500>>116500 left
#### 116500

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 12000, not 120000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
